sn35.15:5.1: As long as I didn’t truly understand these six interior sense fields’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening …
sn35.15:5.2: But when I did truly understand …
sn35.15:5.3: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn35.15:5.4: ‘My freedom is unshakeable; this is my final birth; now there are no more future lives.’”
